1.「こちらは バトルロードコインの| 景品交換所になりますっ。| どの景品を お求: This is the prize exchange for Battle Road|Coins... Which prize are you looking for?<break>

2.「ほかに 交換したい景品は ありますかっ？|<end>: Is there anything else you'd like?|<end>

3.「ほかに 交換したい景品は ありますかっ？|<end>: Is there anything else you'd like?|<end>

4.「あれれっ？ <%sL_BAG_TYPE>がいっぱいで| <%sM_item>は: Huh? Looks like your <%sL_BAG_TYPE>|is full, so you can't carry that.|<bw_break>

5.「ああっ！？ す すみません……。| うまく 交換できなかったみたいです。| 時: What?! I'm s-sorry... something went wrong|with the exchange. Can you try again in a|minute?|<end>

6.「すみません。<%sM_item>は これ以上| 交換できないんです。| 他の景: Sorry, but I can't exchange for any more of|the <%sM_item>. Is there|anything else you'd like instead?|<bw_break>

7.「ありがとうございました！| ジャンジャン バトルに勝って| また 来てください: Thank you very much! Go win some exciting|battles and come back anytime!|<turn end>

8.「ほかに 交換したい景品は ありますかっ？|<end>: Is there anything else you'd like?|<end>

9.「はいっ <%sM_item>ですね！| では バトルロードコイン <%nM_N: Yes, the <%sM_item>! That'll|be <%dM_Num> Battle Road Coins.|<yesno><break>

10.「はいっ <%sM_item> <%nL_KAUKAZU>個ですね！| では バ: Yes, <%dL_KAUKAZU> <%sM_item>! That'll|be <%dM_Num> Battle Road Coins, please.|<yesno><break>

13.「あれれっ？ その景品を交換するには| バトルロードコインが 足りないみたいです: Huh? You don't have enough Battle Road Coins|for that.|<bw_break>

14.「その景品を交換するには| ランクが まだ足りないみたいですっ。| ランクを上げ: Your rank isn't high enough to receive that.|Please raise your rank first, and then|come back to me, okay?|<bw_break>

Here you can use your earned Battle Road|Coins to exchange for a variety of neat|prizes.|
|Also, the higher your rank, the more prizes|you'll have access to, so make sure to win|lots of battles to raise it. Now then...|

18.「あっ <%sM_item>は すでに| 読んだことがあるみたいですが| それで: Seems you've already read that. Do you still|want it?|<yesno><break>

19.「モンスター格闘場の石は モンスター格闘場| 専用のルーラストーンになります。|:
The Monster Arena stone is one that's set to|this location, and can't be rewritten at a|church.|
|You'd like to exchange <%dM_Num> of your|Battle Road Coins for it?|

21.<color_yellow>|絆のエンブレムの説明です。|絆のエンブレムは 職業:
|This will explain the Bonding Emblem. It is|an accessory exclusive to fellow monsters|that uses the Proof accessory slot.|
||When your monster has it equipped, your|tension will sometimes increase by 1 level|whenever you trigger a bond effect.|
||A bond effect can happen regardless if your|monster is in Active or Standby status, but it|will only happen if they are alive.|
||The higher your monster's happiness level,|the more likely a bond effect will occur.
